job.title: Devops / Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.
Job Category
Products and Technology
Job Details
As a SRE at MuleSoft, a Salesforce Company, you will join a team that is in charge of full stack observability and event response, Reliability Engineering, Incident management, GovCloud and Release Engineering for products and services that are on-boarded into the team.
We aim to ensure that the Mulesoft Cloud environment remains available to our customers above industry standards and we aim to proactively address reliability issues before they impact performance or availability.
General Requirements
2+ years experience in a SRE role or related field (DevOps, Production Operations etc)
Experience in Public Cloud environments, specifically with AWS
Experience with New Relic, Sumo Logic, Terraform, Jenkins, Kubernetes, Spinnaker or related tools
Excellent knowledge of Internet technologies and protocols (TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP, SSL, etc.)
Strong experience with API fundamentals (SOAP, REST, RAML or OAS)
Ability to root cause sources of instability in high-traffic, large-scale distributed systems
Solid knowledge of large-scale complex systems from a reliability perspective
Passion for resolving reliability issues and identifying strategies to mitigate repeat issues
Perks
Competitive compensation
Stock options
Annual performance bonus program
OSDE 410 for your family group
Wellness reimbursement
Unlimited vacations
Competitive Education Reimbursement Program
Extended parental leave
Bi-monthly salary inflation adjustment
And so much more!
